name: tm41
effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: ThunderPunch Gen I: Softboiled)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Prevents the foe
from using the same
move in a row.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Prevents the foe
from using the same
move in a row.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
It enrages the foe,
making it incapable
of using the same
move successively.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user torments and enrages the
foe, making it incapable of using the
same move twice in a row.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user torments and enrages the
foe, making it incapable of using the
same move twice in a row.

The user torments and enrages the
foe, making it incapable of using the
same move twice in a row.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user torments and enrages the
target, making it incapable of using the
same move twice in a row.

The user torments and enrages the

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every
Pokémon around it.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user assists an ally by boosting the power of
that ally’s attack.
